plot: Valery and Boris attempt to find solutions to removing the radioactive debris; Ulana attempts to find out the cause of the explosion.

While Valery and Boris attempt to combat the radioactive debris still left by the explosion, a young 'Pavel' gets conscripted along side Afghanistan veterans 'Bacho' and 'Garo' to deal with the radioactive pets left behind by the misplaced citizens in the exclusion zone—felixbryn
